alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued November 10 at 3:54PM EST until November 12 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST FRIDAY NIGHT FOR LAKE MOULTRIE... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 knots with gusts to 25 knots through tonight, then south 20 to 25 knots with gusts to 35 knots Friday and Friday evening. Waves 1 to 2 feet. * WHERE...Lake Moultrie. * WHEN...Until midnight EST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on Lake Moultrie will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Moultrie should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
